title: User Registration and Email Verification
description: Verify user registration flow including email verification link sent and verified successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to user registration page.
Fill valid email and password fields and submit the registration form.
Verify registration API response is successful and verification email is sent.
Use the verification link from the email to verify the account.
Check that email verification is successful and user status is updated.
Attempt login with verified email and password.
User is able to log in and access the authenticated dashboard.

title: User Login with Correct and Incorrect Credentials
description: Test login success with correct credentials and failure with incorrect credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to login page.
Input valid registered email and correct password.
Click login button.
Verify login is successful and dashboard is accessible.
Navigate again to login page.
Input valid email and incorrect password.
Click login button.
Verify login fails with appropriate error message.

title: Password Reset Workflow
description: Validate password reset initiation, email receipt, and successful password update.

steps.description: Navigate to password reset page.
Submit registered email to request password reset.
Check that password reset email is sent.
Click on the password reset link from email.
Set a new valid password and submit.
Verify password update success message.
Attempt to login using new password.
Login is successful with the new password.

title: Generate Static QR Code with Customization
description: Test creation of a static QR code with options for color, size, logo upload, and different formats.

steps.description: Navigate to QR code generator page as anonymous or logged-in user.
Input a valid static URL.
Select custom color, size, and dot/corner style options.
Upload a valid logo image for embedding.
Generate the QR code.
Generated QR code reflects all customization options accurately.
Download the QR code in PNG and SVG formats.
Downloaded QR codes open correctly and contain the intended data.

title: Generate Advanced QR Code with Templates, Gradients, and Effects
description: Validate advanced QR code generation with styling options such as templates, gradients, frames, stickers, and watermark overlays.

steps.description: Login and navigate to advanced QR code generation page.
Select a QR code template and apply a gradient fill.
Add frames, stickers, and apply watermark overlays.
Input a valid URL and generate the code.
QR code is generated with all selected styles properly rendered.

title: Create and Manage Dynamic QR Code with Editable URL, Expiration, and Scan Limits
description: Verify dynamic QR code creation, URL update, expiration enforcement, scan limit management, and analytics capture.

steps.description: Login and navigate to dynamic QR code creation page.
Create a dynamic QR code with a target URL, expiration date, and scan limit.
Confirm dynamic QR code is created and listed in user dashboard.
Update the target URL of the dynamic QR code.
Verify the updated URL is effective for new scans.
Simulate scans up to and beyond the scan limit.
Scan limit is enforced and scans beyond limit are blocked with proper error message.
Simulate scans before and after expiration date.
Access is allowed before expiration and denied after expiration.
View scan analytics dashboard.
Analytics accurately reflect device, browser, location, and timestamp data.

title: Upload and Manage Logo Images in Supabase Storage
description: Validate logo image upload process, including validation, optimization, and retrieval for embedding in QR codes.

steps.description: Login and go to image upload interface.
Upload supported image file (e.g., PNG, JPEG) within size limits.
Image upload succeeds and image is accessible in storage.
Verify image optimization is performed automatically.
Optimized image can be embedded correctly in a QR code.
Attempt to upload unsupported or overly large image files.
Upload is rejected with appropriate error messages.

title: Payment Processing and Subscription Management with Razorpay
description: Test purchasing credits and subscriptions, invoice viewing, and billing enforcement via Razorpay integration.

steps.description: Login and navigate to billing and subscription management dashboard.
Initiate a purchase flow for credits or subscription plan.
Complete payment using Razorpay test environment.
Payment processes successfully and credits/subscription status are updated.
View invoices and billing history.
Invoices display accurate transaction details.
Simulate subscription expiration or cancellation.
Billing enforcement actions restrict features according to subscription status.

title: API Key Generation, Rotation, and Usage Tracking
description: Validate secure creation, rotation, and monitoring of API keys with usage analytics.

steps.description: Login and navigate to developer tools and API key management page.
Generate a new API key.
New API key is created and displayed securely.
Rotate an existing API key.
Old key is invalidated and a new key is issued.
Use API key to create a QR code via the RESTful API.
API usage is tracked and reported on the dashboard.

title: Organization Role-Based Access Control and Invitations
description: Test multi-user organization setup with role assignments, invitation flow, and permission enforcement.

steps.description: Login as organization admin and navigate to organization management.
Send invitation to a new member email.
Invitation email is sent with valid registration link.
New user accepts invitation and registers.
User is added to the organization with the assigned role.
Test that role permissions restrict or allow QR code management features.
Users can only perform actions permitted for their roles.

title: Custom Domain Setup, DNS Verification, SSL, and Routing
description: Validate adding custom domain, DNS record verification, SSL certificate issuance, and proper routing of branded QR codes.

steps.description: Login and navigate to custom domain management page.
Add a new custom domain and follow DNS verification instructions.
DNS verification detects valid records and passes.
Confirm SSL certificate is provisioned for the domain.
Custom domain routes QR code URLs correctly to application.
Generate a QR code associated with the custom domain.
QR code scan resolves to URL with the custom domain.

title: Webhook Setup and Reliable Event Delivery
description: Test webhook registration for QR code scan events, event firing, delivery logging, and retry on failure.

steps.description: Login and register a webhook URL for scan events.
Perform a scan on associated QR code to trigger webhook.
Webhook is called with correct event payload.
Simulate webhook endpoint failure.
Delivery logs show retry attempts and eventual failure or success.

title: Notification Preferences and Digest Email Sending
description: Validate in-app and email notification preferences management and proper sending of notification digests.

steps.description: Login and navigate to notification preferences page.
Enable or disable various notification types and set digest email frequency.
Preferences are saved and reflected correctly.
Trigger notifications such as QR code scan alerts.
Notifications are received in-app and via email according to set preferences.
Verify digest email is sent on configured schedule with correct aggregated content.

title: Rate Limiting Enforcement on API Endpoints
description: Test API rate limiting to throttle excessive requests while allowing normal usage.

steps.description: Send a normal volume of requests to protected API endpoints.
All requests succeed with expected responses.
Send a high volume of requests over a short period to trigger rate limiting.
Excess requests return HTTP 429 Too Many Requests with appropriate message.
Make requests after cooldown period.
Requests succeed again as rate limit resets.

title: Admin Console User Impersonation and Billing Adjustments
description: Validate admin can impersonate other users and perform billing adjustments from admin dashboard.

steps.description: Login as admin and open admin console user management.
Select a user to impersonate and activate impersonation.
Admin interface switches context to impersonated user with correct privileges.
Perform billing credit adjustment for impersonated user.
Billing adjustment is persisted and reflected in user account.
Exit impersonation mode and return to admin context.
Admin console interface is restored to admin privileges.

title: Internationalization - Language Preference and Translation Accuracy
description: Verify multi-language support and correct translations based on user-selected language preference.

steps.description: Change application language preference to multiple supported languages.
UI updates dynamically and shows correct translations for all textual elements.
Test language fallback for unsupported or missing translation keys.
Proper fallback language or default English text is displayed without errors.

title: Bulk QR Code Generation and Export
description: Test batch creation of QR codes and exporting functionalities including streaming large datasets.

steps.description: Login and navigate to bulk operations page.
Upload or input multiple URLs or data sets for batch QR code generation.
Start batch generation process.
Batch QR codes are generated with correct data and styling.
Export generated QR codes in bulk as a compressed archive or CSV.
Export file downloads successfully and contains all generated QR codes.

title: Performance and Reliability Under Load
description: Validate application performance, retry logic, timeout handling, caching effectiveness under simulated loads.

steps.description: Simulate multiple concurrent users generating QR codes and accessing dashboard.
Application response times remain within defined SLAs and no critical failures occur.
Simulate transient network failures and observe retry mechanisms.
Retry logic triggers correctly and eventual success or graceful failure is handled.
Test API calls with cache-enabled responses.
Cache hits improve response time and data freshness is maintained.

title: Security Headers and CSRF Protection
description: Ensure all HTTP responses include security headers and CSRF protection is enforced on sensitive endpoints.

steps.description: Send requests to various application endpoints checking HTTP response headers.
Verify presence of headers such as Content-Security-Policy, X-Frame-Options, X-Content-Type-Options.
Submit forms and API requests without valid CSRF tokens.
Requests are rejected with appropriate CSRF error.
Submit forms and API requests with valid CSRF tokens.
Requests succeed with proper server processing.

title: Observability and Error Reporting Integration
description: Check that errors, metrics, web vitals, and logs are correctly captured and reported to monitoring systems such as Sentry.

steps.description: Trigger frontend and backend errors intentionally.
Verify errors appear in Sentry dashboard with accurate stack traces and context.
Validate that metrics such as request duration, error rates, and web vitals are collected.
Metrics are available for review and alerts are configured for threshold breaches.
